ygData.subject: Off to Vacation
ygData.msgSnippet: Allright, I m off. I forgot to mention yesterday that JP gets controll of Autofire, and KSL also gets controll of DevilDuer till I get back. C ya all in 10

Subject: Off to Vacation
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

From: Yanshosh@...

Allright, I'm off. I forgot to mention yesterday that JP gets controll of 
Autofire, and KSL also gets controll of DevilDuer till I get back. C ya all 
in 10 days, or if I get on a comp before that.

::Zardus/Prowl/DevilDuer/Ramulus/DeathScythe/Mosquitor/Shredder::

Zardus leans back from the femm he had been reprogramming, his arm starting 
to shimmer. It was happening again, he could feel it. He frowns, turning back 
and typing a few commands on a console. A stasis field emerges over the femm, 
keeping her in stasis untill a command from him would disable it. He 
activates his comm-link on a secure channel to all Alliance members other 
than Feline and Skulletron, who were in the Cybertronian Fire.

"Everyone," he says into it, "I'll be gone for a few days. Nemesis Enforcer 
is in charge untill I return. Feline and Skulletron will return soon wearing 
Maximal symbols, don't open fire. They'll have interesting information."

With a flash, Zardus dissapears, to return in a few days.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl blinks, looking down at himself as he turns partly transparent. Prowl 
looks back at Iron Raptor. He was reluctant to leave her, but he had no real 
choice.

"I'll be back in a few days, love," he says to her, quickly kissing her 
before he dissapears.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
In front of the pod, DevilDuer looks at the new bot. "Hello, I'm DevilDuer," 
he says to the bot, "Who are you?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ramulus frowns as his feet pass through a bush, noticing that he was 
shimmering. He sighs. Here it comes again. With a flash, he dissapears, as 
does DeathScythe above.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Without warning, Mosquitor's stupidity causes him to be phazed out from the 
dimention for a few days to fix some bugs with his brain and make him at 
least be able to solve 2 + 2.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Walking alongside Mantella, Shredder suddenly falls to his knees, starting to 
shimmer. He groans as he dissapears with a flash. He hated these small 
phazings, but they were unavoidable.
